Malice:

A silver aircraft was hard to see high in the air.  It drifted in =

unpowered flight in a spiral toward Hydras' base.  Soon it touched 
down o=
n a ridge above the lava bed.  it transformed and the soldier 
set out with=
 beam rifle in hand. With the bow and ventral portion of 
the craft's hull =
as his shield, he rushed across the lava flows, 
slowing as he approached t=
he base itself.  He crawled on his chest to 
observe it, and slipped down b=
y some large rock piles and started 
scouting for a way in.
